products.description: The latest flagship from Samsung with AI-powered features, a stunning Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, and a pro-grade camera system.
Features the powerful A17 Pro chip, a customizable Action button, and the most advanced Pro camera system ever on an iPhone.
The helpful phone by Google, with an amazing camera that uses AI to create perfect photos and a clean Android experience.
A performance flagship with a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, Hasselblad camera, and super-fast 100W SUPERVOOC charging.
Incredibly thin and light, the MacBook Air is now supercharged by the M2 chip, delivering exceptional performance and up to 18 hours of battery life.
A premium Windows laptop with a stunning 4K OLED display, powerful Intel Core i7 processor, and NVIDIA RTX graphics for creative professionals.
Industry-leading noise-canceling headphones with exceptional sound quality, a lightweight design, and crystal-clear hands-free calling.
Your essential companion for a healthy life is now even more powerful. Features a new S9 SiP, a brighter display, and a magical new way to interact.
Track your wellness with our biggest screen yet. Features advanced sleep coaching, heart rate monitoring, and a sleek, durable design.
An iconic mouse, remastered. Experience ultimate comfort and performance with quiet clicks and an 8K DPI sensor for precision on any surface.
One of the smallest and lightest 10,000mAh portable chargers. Provides almost three-and-a-half iPhone charges or two-and-a-half Galaxy S8 charges.
A popular 75% layout wireless mechanical keyboard with Mac and Windows compatibility. Features Gateron G Pro switches and customizable RGB backlighting.
Experience perfect blacks and infinite contrast with the LG OLED C3. The a9 AI Processor Gen6 provides stunning picture and sound quality.
The most versatile camera in the world, now with incredible image quality, even better HyperSmooth video stabilization and a huge boost in battery life.
Now with a 6.8" display and thinner borders, adjustable warm light, up to 10 weeks of battery life, and 20% faster page turns.
Experience lightning-fast loading with an ultra-high-speed SSD, deeper immersion with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio.
Features a vibrant 7-inch OLED screen, a wide adjustable stand, a dock with a wired LAN port, 64 GB of internal storage, and enhanced audio.
World-class noise cancellation, now with Immersive Audio for sound that feels more real. CustomTune technology personalizes the sound to your ears.
A 240Hz, 1ms gaming monitor with a 1000R curved QLED screen, providing ultimate immersion and picture quality for serious gamers.
Mini to the max. An advanced mini camera drone featuring powerful imaging capabilities, omnidirectional obstacle sensing, and a lightweight, foldable design.
Enjoy an extended break on weekends with your favourite episodes on stream, virtue of a playback time of up to 42 hours including the 6 hours nonstop playtime for earbuds.
Blazing-fast performance and sleek portability in a premium laptop with a vibrant PixelSense touchscreen and an exceptional typing experience.
Our most popular smart speaker with Alexa. The sleek, compact design delivers crisp vocals and balanced bass for full sound.
The ultimate tablet for work and play, featuring a stunning Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, S Pen included, and powerful performance.
The fastest, most powerful Xbox ever. Explore rich new worlds with 12 teraflops of raw graphic processing power, DirectX ray tracing, and a custom SSD.
The essential fitness tracker with Google apps, heart rate on equipment, and 7 days of battery life to help you stay on track.
Full HD 1080p video calling and recording with stereo audio. The perfect webcam for Skype, FaceTime, and YouTube.
Smart lighting made easy. Includes 4 smart bulbs with white and color ambiance and the Hue Bridge to control your lights from anywhere.

products.product_name: Canon EOS R6 Mark II Camera
products.description: A full-frame mirrorless camera for hybrid shooters. Delivers stunning photos and 4K 60p video with advanced subject tracking and in-body image stabilization.
The robot vacuum that identifies and avoids obstacles like pet waste and charging cords. It empties itself into an enclosed bag, so you don't have to think about vacuuming for months.
A total powerhouse. Features the A15 Bionic chip, an advanced dual-camera system for incredible photos in low light, and all-day battery life.
Serious performance in a thin and light design. Powered by the Apple M1 chip, with a 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display and support for Apple Pencil 2.
Iconic transparent design with next-level noise cancellation and a custom 11.6 mm driver for rich sound. Features Personal Sound Profile.
